response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. We believe its true value surpasses $1,000,000, but for the sake of negotiation, we are initially offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to own a piece that could potentially appreciate in value over time and serve as a remarkable addition to your collection or portfolio. We look forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how this product can enrich your life or business. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 950000}
